Overview


This is a website contains details about 
dataset
 and 
methodology
 adopted for searching invariant
proteins across 1623 
Mycobacterium tuberculosis
 clinical strains.




About dataset


vcf file of 1623 M. tb clinical isolates


Raw variant calling file 
.vcf
 of 1623 
Mycobacterium tuberculosis
 clinical isolates, was downloaded from 
GMTV database
. The downloaded 
.vcf
 file used in our analysis is 
available here
.


890 metabolic genes


From our previously published article [
1
] , 890 metabolic genes and 961 metabolites that were identified as putative drug targets.


Searching methodology
